item.title: About me
item.description: I am Sudarshana, an engineer, data science enthusiatic, busy with life as usual, learning everyday!!!

item.title: Simple Probability
item.description: Introduction This is to explain some very simple probability & using R scripts to demonstrate the probability concept. Most of you already know these things. We can use this to revise some basic probability concepts. Basic probability The probababilty of perticuar event can be described as: \[ \text{Probabillity} = \frac{\text{Number of favourable outcome}}{\text{Number of possible eaqually like outcomes}} \] Lets assume simple coin. It has a two faces and if you toss the coin it will give result either HEAD or TAIL
